TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract RibbonSplitButton implements class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent, class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonControl, class System.ComponentModel.IComponent, class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 一个功能区控件，它将按钮或切换按钮与下拉菜单组合在一起。

span.span: A Ribbon control that combines a button or a toggle button and a drop-down menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个控件结合了一个按钮或切换按钮和下拉列表菜单。A control combines a button or a toggle button and a drop-down menu. 若要选择按钮或切换按钮，使用属性。To choose between the button and toggle button, use the property. 与不同控件，控件不具有属性，因此内容的集合不能在运行时更改。Unlike the control, the control does not have the property, so contents of the collection cannot be changed at run time. 您可以创建在运行时通过使用方法的对象。You can create a at run time by using the method of the object. 可通过两种方法来访问 对象：There are two ways to access the object: - 通过使用 Ribbon 类的 `Factory` 属性。By using the `Factory` property of the Ribbon class. 可从 Ribbon 类中的代码使用此方法。Use this approach from code in your Ribbon class. - 通过使用 `Globals.Factory.GetRibbonFactory` 方法。By using the `Globals.Factory.GetRibbonFactory` method. 可从 Ribbon 类外的代码使用此方法。Use this approach from code outside your Ribbon class. [!INCLUDE[vsto_interface](~/includes/vsto-interface-md.md)] ## 用法Usage [!INCLUDE[vsto_net35mref](~/includes/vsto-net35mref-md.md)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用 上的按钮。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the button on the is enabled.

value.span: 如果已启用 的按钮，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the button of the is enabled; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性是特定于的按钮部分。This property is specific to the button part of the . 如果只有按钮处于禁用状态，用户仍可以打开下拉列表菜单并单击其中的控件。If only the button is disabled, users can still open the drop-down menu and click the controls there. 与此相反，属性指示是否整个启用控件。In contrast, the property indicates whether the entire control is enabled. 如果完全禁用该控件，则整个控件不响应任何用户操作。If the control is disabled completely, the entire control does not react to any user actions. 可以在运行时更改此属性。This property can be changed at run time.

summary.span: 获取或设置 上的按钮类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of the button on the .

value.span: 一个 ，表示 上的按钮类型。

span.span: A that represents the type of the button on the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 两个选项是和。The two options are and . 不能在运行时更改该属性。The property cannot be changed at run time.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否按下了 。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether is pressed or not pressed.

value.span: 如果按下了 ，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the is pressed; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性仅适用于设置为。This property applies only if is set to . 可以在运行时更改此属性。This property can be changed at run time.

summary.span: 当用户单击 控件时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user clicks the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当已属性设置为，则引发此事件之前更新属性。When the has the property set to , the property is updated before this event is raised.

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件的大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the size of the control.

value.span: 一个Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize表示大小的控件。

span.span: A Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize that represents the size of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性不起如果是菜单的一部分。This property has no effect if the is part of a menu. 的上出现一个菜单始终设置为`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeRegular`除非父控件`ItemSize`设置为`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`。The of a that appears on a menu is always set to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeRegular` unless the parent control's `ItemSize` is set to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`. 若要使下拉列表菜单控件显示得更大，设置的属性到`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`。To make drop-down menu controls appear larger, set the property of the to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`. 可以在运行时设置此属性。This property can be set at run time.

summary.span: 获取或设置下拉菜单中此 控件上显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that appears on this control in a drop-down menu.

value.span: 如果文本位于下拉菜单内，则会在控件上显示。

span.span: The text that appears on the control when it is inside of a drop-down menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该说明将显示何时嵌套在另一个菜单或拆分按钮，并父菜单的属性设置为`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`。The description appears when the is nested in another menu or split button, and the property of the parent menu is set to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`. 如果设置为`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeRegular`，说明未显示。If the is set to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeRegular`, the description does not appear. 可以在运行时更改此属性。This property can be changed at run time.

summary.span: 获取或设置控件上显示的图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the image that is displayed on the control.

value.span: 一个在控件上显示的 。

span.span: An that is displayed on the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建议的图像格式是 PNG，因为 PNG 格式的图像支持通过其 alpha 通道的透明度。The recommended image format is PNG, because images in the PNG format support transparency through their alpha channel. 属性标识控件显示的图像。The property identifies an image that is displayed by the control. 在设计时或在运行时，可以设置此属性。This property can be set at design time or at run time. 如果在运行时中更新此属性，该控件的外观被更新以反映更改。If you update this property at run time, the control's appearance is updated to reflect the change. 如果设置属性，则和属性将被忽略。If the property is set, the and properties are ignored. 尽管属性可让您更好地控制比其他两个属性，这一点可以是速度较慢，因为每次更新控件时，图像对象发送到 Office 应用程序。Although the property gives you more control than the other two properties do, it can be slower because the image object is sent to the Office application every time the control is updated.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个名称，该名称可用于在 E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.LoadImage 事件处理程序中标识控件图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the name that you can use in the E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.LoadImage event handler to identify an image for the control.

value.span: 一个字符串，可用于在E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.LoadImage事件处理程序中标识控件图像。

span.span: A string that you can use in the E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.LoadImage event handler to identify an image for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识控件显示的图像。The property identifies an image that is displayed by the control. Office 应用程序此映像从你的解决方案只检索一次，以提高性能。The Office application retrieves this image from your solution only once, to improve performance. 此属性可以设置只能在设计时，因为它标识的图像加载过程事件。This property can be set only at design time, because the image it identifies is loaded during the event. 时将引发一次每个映像名称显示在功能区。 is raised only once per image name, when the Ribbon is displayed. 之后，不能使用此属性更改控件图像。After that, the control image cannot be changed by using this property. 若要加载图像，将代码添加到事件处理程序。To load the image, add code to the event handler. 检查的属性并设置属性的到想要加载的图像的对象。Check the property of the and set the property of the object to the image that you want to load. 如果忽略此属性属性或属性设置。This property is ignored if either the property or the property is set. 标识的图像属性可以稍快于标识的图像加载显示属性，因为 Office 应用程序中检索映像解决方案仅在首次从功能区。Images identified by the property can be loaded slightly faster than images identified by the property, because the Office application retrieves the image from your solution only the first time the Ribbon is displayed.

summary.span: 获取此 上的控件的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of controls that are on this .

value.span: 上的控件的集合。

span.span: A collection of controls on the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在运行时仅在某些情况下设置此属性。This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions. 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview).

summary.span: 获取或设置 下拉菜单上控件的大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the size of the controls on the drop-down menu.

value.span: 一个Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize ，表示控件的大小在下拉列表菜单。

span.span: A Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize that represents the size of the controls on the drop-down menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要放大上的控件下拉列表菜单中，将属性设置为`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`。To enlarge controls that are on the drop-down menu, set the property to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`. 可以在运行时仅在某些情况下设置此属性。This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions. 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview). 若要更改的大小控件，请参阅属性。To change the size of the control, see the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件的键盘快捷键。

span.span: Gets or sets the keyboard shortcut of the control.

value.span: 一个字符串，表示 控件的键盘快捷键。

span.span: A string that represents the keyboard shortcut of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Keytip 必须包含 1 到 3 个大写字符，不能包含空格、 制表符或换行字符。A KeyTip must have from 1 to 3 uppercase characters, and must not contain spaces, tabs, or newline characters. Keytip 有时也称为访问密钥或加速器和用作激活控件的快捷组合键。KeyTips are sometimes known as access keys or accelerators and are used as shortcut key combinations that activate controls. 按下 ALT 键时，键提示将显示在功能区上。KeyTips appear on the Ribbon when you press the ALT key. 如果内置控件或从其他加载项，你的快捷键提示与键提示冲突，Microsoft Office 可能会自动分配非冲突快捷键提示值。If your KeyTip conflicts with KeyTips for built-in controls or from other add-ins, Microsoft Office might assign non-conflicting KeyTip values automatically. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用键盘处理功能区程序](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=93523)。For more information, see [Use the keyboard to work with Ribbon programs](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=93523). 您可以更改在设计时或运行的时。You can change the at design time or run time.

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件上的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text on the control.

value.span: 一个字符串，表示 控件上的文本。

span.span: A string that represents the text on the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要隐藏标签，设置到`false`。To hide the label, set to `false`. 属性可以设置在设计时和运行时。The property can be set at design time and run time.

summary.span: 如果要使用内置 Microsoft Office 图标，请获取或设置要在 控件上显示的图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the image to display on the control, if you want to use a built-in Microsoft Office icon.

value.span: 作为此控件图标的内置 Microsoft Office 图标的 ID。

span.span: The ID of a built-in Microsoft Office icon that serves as the icon for this control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识的控件显示 Office 图标。The property identifies an Office icon that is displayed by the control. 属性值是一个字符串，标识`imageMso`所选图标的值。The property value is a string that identifies the `imageMso` value of the selected icon. 在设计时或在运行时，可以设置此属性。This property can be set at design time or at run time. 如果在运行时中更新此属性，该控件的外观被更新以反映更改。If you update this property at run time, the control's appearance is updated to reflect the change. 有关一系列`imageMso`值，请参阅 Microsoft 下载中心页[Office 2010 外接程序： 图标库](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=220760)。For a list of `imageMso` values, see the Microsoft Download Center page [Office 2010 Add-In: Icons Gallery](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=220760). 如果忽略此属性属性设置。This property is ignored if the property is set. 标识的图像属性可以稍快于标识的图像加载属性，因为这些图像缓存在 Office 应用程序。Images identified by the property can be loaded slightly faster than images identified by the property, because the images are cached in the Office application. ## Examples 下面的示例将 Microsoft Office 图标分配给的拆分按钮。The following example assigns a Microsoft Office icon to a split button. 若要运行此代码示例，必须首先执行以下步骤：To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps: 1. 添加**功能区 （可视化设计器）** 项通过使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具创建的项目。Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to a project created by using Office development tools in Visual Studio. 2. 将组添加到自定义选项卡。Add a group to the custom tab. 3. 添加到组的拆分按钮。Add a split button to the group. [!code-csharp[Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties#9](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties/CS/Ribbon1.cs#9)] [!code-vb[Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties#9](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties/VB/Ribbon1.vb#9)]

summary.span: 如果控件位于 Microsoft Office 菜单上，请获取或设置 控件的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the position of the control, if the control is on the Microsoft Office Menu.

value.span: 一个 ，表示 控件的位置（如果控件位于 Microsoft Office 菜单上）。

span.span: A that represents the position of the control, if the control is on the Microsoft Office Menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能使用此属性设置的位置组中的控件。You cannot use this property to set the position of a control within a group. 若要排列控件拖动到正确的位置或使用 CTRL + 箭头键在功能区设计器中移动控件。To arrange controls, drag them to the correct positions or use the CTRL+arrow keys to move the controls in the Ribbon Designer. 可以在运行时仅在某些情况下设置此属性。This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions. 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview).

summary.span: 获取或设置当用户将指针移到 控件上时显示的工具提示文本。

span.span: Gets or sets tooltip text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the control.

value.span: 当用户将指针移到 控件上时显示的文本。

span.span: The text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值必须是长度小于 1024年个字符。The value must be less than 1024 characters in length. 当设置属性，则值将显示的标题为。When the property is set, the value appears as the title of the . 此属性可以更改在设计时和运行时。This property can be changed at design time and run time.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 控件的标签是否可见。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the label for the control is visible.

value.span: 如果 控件的标签可见，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the label for the control is visible; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性始终为`true`如果您设置属性设置为`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`。This property is always `true` if you set the property to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`. 此属性可以更改在设计时和运行时。This property can be changed at design time and run time.

summary.span: 获取或设置当用户将指针移到 控件上时显示的多行工具提示文本。

span.span: Gets or sets multiline tooltip text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the control.

value.span: 包含多行提示文本的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains multiline tip text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字符串必须是长度小于 1024年个字符。The string must be less than 1024 characters in length. 下显示文本。The appears under text. 与不同，则启用换行符的字符串中。Unlike the , the enables line breaks in the string. 您可以更改在设计时和运行时。You can change the at design time and at runtime.

summary.span: 如果 控件位于 Microsoft Office 菜单上，请获取或设置该控件顶部显示的标题。

span.span: Gets or sets the title that appears on top of the control if the control is on the Microsoft Office Menu.

value.span: 控件的标题（如果控件位于 Microsoft Office 菜单上）。

span.span: The title for the control if the control is on the Microsoft Office Menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性适用于仅当它位于 Microsoft Office 菜单上。This property applies to the only if it is on the Microsoft Office Menu. 在设计时和运行时，可以更改此属性。This property can be changed at design time and at run time.
